lines.text: She felt the warmth of a fire. She could feel his warm touch as it was grasping around--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Around what? Around her waist? Around her buttocks? What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is so good, Jester!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! Thank you, Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, at this point, trying to ignore that and facing forward, is continuing. The path, this protracted tunnel, you begin to notice smaller tunnels intersecting with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like on the sides, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like one on the side, one a little higher.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Up in front of us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You give it a lot of character.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As she reached down--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Man, I hate to interrupt, but you know, we have some divergent pathways ahead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How big are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk up to the second one. It's a little more up on the left, higher range of it, and you can see there are bits of stone and dirt that have fallen out and created a small pile on the ground beneath it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do they bear any resemblance to the giant hole that we were following?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, you want to send that cat of yours about 50 feet behind us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, behind us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we hear anything coming from the tunnels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, who have been so distracted by the reading of the book, hear nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That one looks like something came out of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wouldn't maybe if you were traveling these caves, you would've capped them because of things that kept popping out of the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, looking at this, you figure these tunnels existed before this burrowing happened, and it looks like when this worm came through, it tore through whatever these tunnels were and pushed shit into them and wrecked a little bit of this tunnel structure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: After the big guy came through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's funny, that was exactly what was about to happen. I'm sorry, what? I'm going to-- I bookmarked it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus, go look up front! Jesus, god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can't see in the dark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a light. Does it look like these were-- I'm going to go up to one and examine it. Do I hear anything? Do I see any scrapings that would give a sign?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Listening in, looking up there, you don't see anything-- the one to the right, you don't see anything, you don't hear anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These markings on the interior--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice some markings, quick little cuts in the dirt or stone, like hand or claw marks dragged across bits of it. Small.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something burrowed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the pile of rocks and dirt that have fallen along the top. You glance over and you can see something somewhat shiny that's picking up the light from your globe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to clean it off a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like a hammer, but it's not well taken care of, per se. Your nose picks up a little bit of the air here; it smells somewhat rancid, a little bit. Just a faint hint of rot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything behind us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm worried about the things around us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How high off of the ground is that hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about ten feet up. The whole tunnel is one big ten-foot side to side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to clear away a little bit more. Is there a body underneath this pile?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a hammer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, just like a discarded tool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take a look at the hammer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a hammer. It looks like it's seen a lot of use.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why? Why a hammer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The metal's wrecked a little bit in places and it's been bludgeoned and misused.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think someone got grabbed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are the rocks around here dug out, like someone was digging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have been dug, and you see signs that they were dug out by hand and dug out by shovel, or some sort of a tool used for digging.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From above, or from--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From above and the side. You get the sense that the one that opens up here connected to the other one, and this tunnel was burrowed in the middle and took out that connecting point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a crazy idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, that we can be under the Ashkeeper Peaks and these are mining tunnels?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's way better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He just wanted to play Parcheesi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What were you thinking, Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that this was some sort of pathway and maybe this closed-off pathway here is possibly the way to go, I don't know. I feel like we might have found a way of sneaking into where we're going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sneaking in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there any remnants of precious metals, coals, things that would be mined?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around here, most of it appears to be carved stone and dirt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anyone doesn't mind, I'm going to pull out my shovel and start working on this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we're dead under this mountain-peak, right? (counting) We're like (taps).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got to be, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This blocked off path that this got bisected--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we could go up to get out if we wanted to get out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we could go down this way, because I don't think there's that much dirt in this--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can bail if we wanted to, perhaps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would I know the exact boundary line of Xhorhas between the Empire? Do they use the mountains?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Ashkeeper Peaks are what divides the two sides of eastern and western Wynandir, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can keep going if we have to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can go see the sun for a couple of hours, get some vitamin D, and then come back down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we're under the mountains, it could be a long way up, and we don't know what those mountains look like. I mean, I don't know, it also could be fall and temperate and beautiful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There could be pigeons on the mountaintop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Edible pigeons?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there another kind?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I read scary books when I was little about these creatures that lived in the mountains that were see-through because they lived underground for so long, but they had really long claws and they would snatch up babies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not helping.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just saying maybe we should avoid them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start prodding to see how deep this cap on this bottom one goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a couple of feet deep, and the rest of the tunnel goes beyond, but for you, Caduceus, it's a tight squeeze. We're talking Bishop in Aliens getting through the tunnel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I feel any wind, anything--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just stagnant air?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. There's no breeze in here, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we go topside, what are the possible benefits of doing that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, not going to Xhorhas and getting murdered by far greater forces--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to Xhorhas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- but I think we're going to Xhorhas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could go up and maybe find a horse or something and coax it down here to take us faster.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A horse on the top of the mountain?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, if this miner fellow who was eaten alive left a couple of horses tied up there--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why would he leave horses on top of a mountain?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would you bring them into the mountain? You would leave them tied up on top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if it's not a miner from the top? What if it's one of the creatures that I was talking about and this is his hammer and the tunnel actually--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The worm's hammer?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, what if it's a creature that lives in the mountain and he's got a hammer and one of these tunnels leads to his village under the mountain and it's a whole village of scary people that's going to attack us as soon as we--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ask the hammer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What would you like me to ask the hammer?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who was your owner?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is really only one reason to use the side tunnels.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who was your owner?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) To go poop, because there's not really a lot of privacy--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can do that anywhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have been surprised, but I would have been delighted as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have any real positives for going up? I honestly can't think of any.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only if we wanted to give up, which we are not doing, so we go forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is, arguably, going to lead to a nexus, right? Like an entry point?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So what's on the other si-- Did they build a military base around the entrance to this tunnel system and is that what we're about to walk into?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we go up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we go forward. If we keep following this, is it going to lead us--

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no way to know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, no, I know. I was just kind of throwing it out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far can Frumpkin go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, that's a good idea. Can we send Frumpkin down one of these tiny tunnels?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quite a ways, but if he gets too far away, I no longer have the ability to communicate with him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about just to that edge, then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you send Frumpkin ahead?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a perception check for Frumpkin. In the dark, so disadvantage on the perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait. I have an idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your idea?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I cast Daylight? We could tie a ribbon around Frumpkin's neck, I cast Daylight on his neck, on the ribbon, and then he can see wherever he goes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can cast Light on the ribbon, too, so you don't have to burn a spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, that's better than that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cast Light on something tied to Frumpkin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take a ribbon off my horn and wrap it around Frumpkin's neck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a good idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put the ribbon on the backside so it's not right in his eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You tie a little ribbon around Frumpkin's neck, you cast Light, and now the ribbon gives off this torchlight glow from the back of Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For the first ten seconds, Frumpkin goes-- (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get it off!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But gets used to it, and then trots off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now roll a straight perception roll for Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did, I rolled twice, so it's a 16 perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a number of other tunnels that all intersect into this area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any immediate reaction to a glowing cat entering into this big chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe roll back and try one of these smaller tunnels also, just to see what's a few feet down, maybe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't hear anybody.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, it seems like the thing to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He can't hear us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can't hear us when he's doing these things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many chambers are-- Is it just many, many--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten or so different tunnels lead into this chamber, all ranging between two feet wide to about three feet wide.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just watching. I can no longer send commands, I can only go along for the ride to watch. Am I seeing anything like mining equipment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stacks of a bunch of junk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the cage, there's some sort of a furred creature, no more than that big or so, that's missing tufts of fur, and it's in the cage going (growling).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I leave him there and come out of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What'd you see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it's a good walk a ways, and then there is a larger chamber with many different exits to it, and my good boy saw some sort of creature in a cage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How big of a creature?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wuh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it seem cute?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hard to tell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said there's a lot of entrances and exits to this place?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has a bunch of pieces of rock and stone and levels where these tunnels are emerging and appearing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know that the cricks have been making many attacks, so maybe this is where they go, this is Grand Central and then they shoot off to different places to attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know what the right thing to do is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't either.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Above ground, pretty sure they're covered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a good point, Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a good point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just wish we knew what these things were. I would have loved to explore some of these.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're small, right? They're small tunnels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I mean, we're already dealing with the two-body-width tunnel as it is; I don't want to shrink it down any lower and really be fucked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My thought was we could send the cat up and down really quick and just take a look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Send the cat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know why we don't just take a peek.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is what we're doing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We sent the cat down the big tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the cat continued down the big tunnel and found that other chamber. The tunnel continues past that chamber, by the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought the cat went up the small tunnel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had a funny feeling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this was Frumpkin going ahead on the tunnel you guys were traveling and found that other chamber, and the tunnel continues on the other side of this chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We didn't take the side with Frumpkin. Just confusion, that's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's send him up the small one. That's what I was thinking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, bring him back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, he knows to come back in five minutes if he does not hear from me, so we have to wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Frumpkin returns.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Top one, quick look, not too far up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Go down the little ones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both sitting in there, spears set to the side (gnawing noises).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: About how far away from me has Frumpkin gone at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 30 or so feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 30 or so feet. (snaps fingers) Pull him back. I don't know if they saw him or not; he is glowing.

lines.name: MATT, LIAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last thing Frumpkin sees is them go (hiss).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (fwoomp) Little lizard people down that way, and they saw my cat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd rather them see us now than--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll run up and push myself up against the wall, against where the tunnel is, just in case they decide to come out that way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will take the other side of it and do the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys all heading to split to the sides?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to fan out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we hear any movement coming from the tunnel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make stealth checks, guys, by the way, because this is now going to see you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without a Trace on all of us while we were hiding. Is that okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say a straight stealth check on this one, this happened too quickly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I use my cloak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, your cloak affects any stealth check you make, for the most part.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha rolled a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord rolled a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, a 17.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sniffs) Looks right over towards Fjord and goes (questioning chitters).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach down and grab the spear and yank it out of its hands!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you?! (yells)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one behind it looks through and is like (alarmed hiss) and turns around and runs down the hall, and the one that's there is like (panting).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out a small, little stone pyramid in my hand and mutter a few words and then cast Tongues and speak to this little thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Well, as you're casting the spell, you hear the one that ran back go like (shouts of alarm).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh jeez.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin to hear this echoing sound of lots of claws scurrying their way through the nearby tunnels.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! No, no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the best!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got to get both out of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Talk to them, tell them we're friends!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop them!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll come back here in just a moment to pick up from there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I hear something like, "Look at these motherfuckers out there!"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you were casting the spell, this suddenly happens-- it wasn't finished-- and when we come back, I'll begin to give you the idea of what you're beginning to hear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah, we'll see you guys here in a few minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first winner is Rickymarooo!

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Rickymarooo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second one, it appears to be-- it's 2r0m0c0. Congratulations, you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bot username.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, bot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get you guys your successful wins soon. Before I forget, I was going to mention it beforehand, I totally forgot. For those who don't know, there's a Rick and Morty versus Dungeons and Dragons comic book.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They just released the fourth and final issue. It's written by our friend of the show, Patrick Rothfuss, if you remember from campaign one.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (mimicking Matt) Patrick Rothfuss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Author extraordinaire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty awesome, you should check it out if you have the opportunity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's pretty great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty awesome. Gary Gygax's ghost says a fun phrase.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Same page as you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. Anyway. Getting back into the insanity, you had just grabbed the spear from a nearby kobold as the other one rushed off. I would like for you to make a strength check, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, good. This is my forte these days.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were just lifting so many pebbles, you'll be great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Against a tiny little thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You grab its spear and it goes (yell).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck! That's so embarrassing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And pulls it back from you as you hear the mounting skittering of numerous creatures now coming from behind where you were and from the nearby tunnels. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, just to specify, from up where Frumpkin just was, from that direction? Or multiple directions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Multiple directions, behind you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're in the honeycombs in the ceiling, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Disguise Self and make myself look like a giant one of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man, not again!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should run. We should go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head to the tunnel, then head to the main room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just run forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're casting the spell, transforming into a larger kobold, you start rushing forward. Are you guys all heading forward with Fjord?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will head forward--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mage Armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- but power walking like a badass, strolling behind, in case I want to deck some kobolds in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're holding the line. What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have come to speak, I say, in whatever language I now understand and speak.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to augment that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I act like I'm saying it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I made it very clear and held my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. There's definitely a confused division and attention here as they're like (chittering).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: World of magic and mystery!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They can all hear you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have come through to chase a large serpent through these caves and eradicate it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ones behind Beau-- as you're strolling up and he's shouting this out, there are about ten or so kobolds that begin to rush up from behind, and they see you, and they slow their step and start taking their spears and prodding you to join the rest of the people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, tell them that I'm their god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Easy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look a bit hungry, a bit sallow, and the one that's in the full armor steps forward towards you and you and is looking back and forth and gives you this curious look.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We mean you no harm. We wish to pass through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) You hear him say, in Draconic, "Come forth, loud meal."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice, Draconic!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, I was trying to make it look like I was talking, Caleb! Argh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number that are staring at you in half awe, like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Deity!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In Draconic, saying-- well, through the spell: I am one meal, but my friends can make more food than me. I am--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you approach?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take two steps forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Why though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two steps forward-- that's an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're saying this with intensity and force, you guys watch as suddenly there's a cloud of dust around his ankles, and a rope loop wraps and pulls your legs together and hoists you up, and you're now dangling about three, four feet off the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can still work this out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one raises his hand up and they all get quiet and he goes--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's pretty funny!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's pretty good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You! Loud food!" Points at the rest of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're just dangling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You want pass?" Yep, as your hair is just dripping there and you're slowly (creaking).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His coat up. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's following you with this nasty looking shortsword that looks like the edges of it are grimed up with black oil or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do not want to tangle with the spirits I command. I snap my fingers and Frumpkin appears, and four globules of light float in a circle around Frumpkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Upside down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beware the spirit of the Maine Coon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Intimidation? That's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He who summoned kitty spirit."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You will be cursed for decades.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We already cursed!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does it say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you give one to feed, or trade for food." He's looking at you. He's making this challenge to you, but is definitely keeping a distance, and is taking a step back from where he was standing so confidently in your direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You expect me to hand over one of my own?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This cat will burn you-- burn you all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He sounds very intimidating right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I heard that, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm speaking through a spell, so--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at the specifics of Tongues here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tongues.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So all of you hear this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we're all on the same page.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's excellent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! We can make food.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't understand them, but we can understand you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, strangely enough, it's speaking in broken Common.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there any way I can just add a Thaumaturgy effect to the cat really quickly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How so? What do you want to enhance?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want the ground around the cat to shake gently and start having a minor earthquake effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin stands and does that little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Frumpkin does that, and the rocks shake and tumble around in this small quaking noise, about six of the nearby kobolds go (gasping), and start skitting away from it, holding their weapons at bay. Two of them in the tunnels all of a sudden go (squeaking), and climb up in the tunnels and vanish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have food, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, little me's, we have food for you! Worship me! I am your leader!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I am your leader!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh lord.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see two of them begin to reach towards you, like-- (excited breathing).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one in the full armor goes, "No pay attention!" and slaps them with his spear and they (snarl).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about the food?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We bring food for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Trade!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll need containers. Do you have a couple of pots? Big containers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sybil!" Points to one in there and you see this one kobold that's covered in rags-- kind of looks like the collector lady from Labyrinth-- and pulls out this large, billowing leather sack that's stained of all sorts of colors around its basis. (heavy breathing) It holds it up. Its jaw is slightly dislodged on one side and gives it this crooked grin to its face. Holds it open.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you care about water? I can do water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have water."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fill food!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a little piece of fungus off the stick, and I'm going to put it in there, and I'm going to start casting Create Food and Water and it's going to suddenly become 45 pounds of food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as that kobold leans forward, pulled off of his feet and manages to stumble into it and look inside. (sniffs) "Whoa!" Begins to shovel it. The leader then goes, "Stop! We eat!"

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: It's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two may pass. More food for trade rest. Huh?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Fey King is growing angry with you, and the globules of light start to spin a little quicker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A little more thunder maybe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two and the Fey King can also pass."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the leader-- your leader? Can I go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the others all nervously looking towards the other, and you can see him feeling really intimidated by your presence. There's this idea of him being the head of this sect and you storming in here, and he's just-- this jealous intensity as it stares towards you and goes, "Do not listen! Why you come?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I came because I'm a really good friend of yours. I'm a leader here, and also I just wanted to go through with my friends?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "False leader may go as well!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have two gator skins in the bag of holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What? Gator?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, bet you could use it as some--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think that they really--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see four other mouths watering as you're describing this tough gator skin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so expensive and difficult to come by, in this part of the world.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, yeah, it's so rare. I mean, maybe it's better we just hold onto the gator.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't want-- I mean, we certainly don't want to give it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Give us gator skin!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. I mean, I could maybe part with one for the rest of us--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No! All of it!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, all right. I pull out two gator skins. My friends will have to be able to go on their way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mister Fjord, are you sure?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I hate to. They're worth a fortune and, boy, the protection that they yield, mmm dogie. Ah-- okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (satisfied grunt) Puts it over the side pouch of one of the other ones-- carries it and, (excited grunt). Is that both of them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all of us then, huh? We can go then?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, because there was the two, and then the other two, and then the king, and the leader.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then the leader, and then we had the friends with the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm only a half, really. I'm half.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's important, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's half of the next person, that comes through at that point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Definitely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them steps forward and goes, "I think that is--" "Shh! I'm making number!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can also offer you this-- I have a pouch of smoking tobacco. You could smoke this and it will make you forget your troubles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It leans forward towards you, giving a look and goes, "You (sniffs), goblin."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus. 17.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes the pouch from you. (sniffs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can eat it. Ugh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Accepted."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You being able to recognize, saying, "All right, let them pass."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I jump down and take out one of my shurikens and chop Caleb free.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (thudding) Like a sack of potatoes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that 1d6?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From that height? Yeah, that would be four points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah, jeez.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just making sure nobody's tried to-- I've been trying to keep an eye on things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I don't want them ganking our stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nobody's tried to gank anything, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got my hands on our stuff the whole time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're keeping watch, and a few do get close and they're definitely eyeing the various trinkets that dangle from your belts, but as any of them start getting close you grab and they pull back. The leader goes, "Go. Follow path of big worm. Make big mess. Go!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nugget, come on!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, a path the big one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make big mess?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, question about that: Did you see how many of them there were with the big worm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just looking at you angrily, this--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guys that made a big mess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Big mess. Move through. No longer here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long ago, do you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Days, weeks."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it seem like a lot of people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very loud. Ruin tunnel."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How big was the worm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very big."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're very small though, so in relation to them it may well be--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true, it's kind of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ask them if they've been all the way to the end of the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can ask them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They understand us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you been all the way to the end of big mess tunnel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. No go."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Stay here, home. Eat food from you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know who is caged up, aways down this tunnel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?" Points over to the small cage with the little creature, you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's in this room?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we ran forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I see. Got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, what is in that cage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is food."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't eat it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it cute, or not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty ragged.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we going to pass judgment on this thing? Come on! Let's just keep going and turn a blind eye.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is the cage locked, or is it just shut?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this distance, it looks closed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you rescue this thing, could it be cute ever?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a little TLC, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we shouldn't let it just die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not even sure what kind of creature it is. It kind of resembles a squirrel, kind of resembles a small dog, but it's greasy and ratty and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trade your dog for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not going to trade Nugget, no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just trade Nugget for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we going to be walking within 30 feet of that cage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most likely, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tell you what. Do you want this creature?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I don't want it to suffer in a cage, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will give you the Fey King, in exchange for this creature here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The cat? No, you can't!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is going to backfire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Deception, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? "You can give Fey King?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He will bring blessings to your people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Take food, keep king."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Take the f-- okay. Telepathically, I tell Frumpkin: I'll bring you back in one day, buddy. In my head, and he trods forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bigger than that one. False leader."

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: (snarling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let go!" All of them pull back and begin to disappear into the tunnels behind, and you guys are given a path through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have food, the creature in the cage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cage is just right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pick it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's open it up.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Take the whole cage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once the cage is within 30 feet, I'm just going to pop it open with Thaumaturgy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the creature immediately jumps out (shrieks), and darts off down the tunnel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah, it's rabies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay, it's alive. Thanks, Caleb!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bye, buddy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The thing is going to die in ten more feet from something else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be like one of those YouTube videos, where they let the mouse go in the forest and just the hawk-- like ten feet.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue on the path?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It didn't last one day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're leaving, Caduceus, you notice, that the leader leans over to two other kobolds, and whispers something to them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do I hear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a low muttering, but not in a language you understand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's interesting. Can your cat hear what they're talking about?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, but I'm not zooming into him right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if we want to keep an ear out for what they're up to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (swoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what was that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I just jumped into the Fey King really quick to see if anything was happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, after you guys leave, everyone scatters into the chambers, but stays behind and watches, and two of the kobolds slowly begin to follow behind the group in the tunnel after you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's let them do it for a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a staff and it has an actual small cage, like the one that you just opened, on its side with something inside it. The other one just looks to be a small spear-holding scout and they're both being quiet as they can, but the one carrying everything isn't very quiet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're on our tail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you can hear the gentle clanging of various accessories of this kobold trying to be quiet, pursuing you down the tunnel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as they're keeping some distance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want me to take them out? Or at least--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Disarm them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's lead them away from the pack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They might have useful information.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're so cute.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think that's accurate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They both have weapons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, one of them is just covered in--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You travel for about an hour or so, away from that, the tunnel continuing before you. They're still staying back by about 60 or so feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, so they're not even being secretive about it.

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: They think they are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're escorting us out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think at some point-- When's the point where it's time to bed down? Are we getting to that point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say you're probably within another hour or so of that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think at some point we're going to "bed down."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's a great idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and then we'll go to sleep?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then we'll go to sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Go to sleep."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Good idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you guys eventually reach that point and you begin to bed down. What do you do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to-- I think we should--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put on a show. I think they need some entertainment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You mean like as in: (projecting) Hey! We should go to sleep! Like that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Oh, I'm feeling so tired.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My feet, they hurt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not a big kobold. I'm me again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because you're a god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right, I can take any form I want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm glad to see your true form, mistress!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! I'm glad everyone worships me like they should.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While they're shouting at each other, I'm going to turn invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm going to sneak back there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Back towards them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys... lay down? What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk around dramatically for a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the dome out? Are we summoning the whole thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is the dome out or are you waiting?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have not done that yet--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll try to look for firewood, but I'm so exhausted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to be so hard to find wood down here in the tunnels.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Point of clarification: are we travelling through worm tunnel at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Which is how wide again, ten--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten feet across.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Always been ten feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sitting cross-legged on the floor, staring at the dirt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think we need to pull up the dome right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not yet, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I nearing them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're invisible-- are you walking back towards their direction?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You see the two of them, around the bend, are both looking and the one with the spear is looking kind of eager. The one with all the shit on it is looking a little apprehensive and they're both just watching and talking back and forth. (kobold speech)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Nott out of our sight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Nott vanished a few minutes ago.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try to sneak up on the one with the spear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And get close to he or she and grab the spear out of their hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, with advantage, make an athletics check to try and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven. The spear vanishes from its hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll throw it the opposite direction down the tunnel away from us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (confused kobold noises) He looks confused and rubs his wrist and starts walking back towards the spear on the opposite side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one that's all weird and shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, not advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say advantage because it doesn't know you're there. I'll allow it. It's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yells of surprise and disbelief)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You son of a bitch! You slow-playing son of a bitch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Playing the long game. The long con!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Move over, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (pandemonium)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god! Long con!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was some bullshit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make some room here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome, Chris.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Thank you very much!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?! We were specifically told...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not playing.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Not playing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just visiting!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: This is a house of lies! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: No peeking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No peeking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. Suddenly, out of nowhere, apparates in the nervous energy of the moment the small goblin creature that you've been eyeing nervously as the group wandered through, and it just reaches out and grabs a hold of you.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Ah! Mommy! Mommy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I am your mommy! Yeah! Deal with it!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: So this kobold has... he's got flasks hanging off him by ropes and you can see that these flasks are basically just stoppered gourds and they're clattering and banging together. He's got a basket of swarming centipedes slung over his back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Open?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: No, it's also closed off, almost like a closed off net of centipedes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: With a rope attached to it. And then there is a clay pot hanging from that, that has an acrid smell rising from it and another clay pot tied to a rope that's lashed around his shoulders. His weapon is a staff with a living scorpion tied at the top of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caduceus, where are you when I need you?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: And the cage holds a creature that you recognise as a skunk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This fucking--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is chemical warfare, man.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: The worst is, tied to this stick with the scorpion on it is a bag that is buzzing loudly like it's full of hornets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, bees.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, bees!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you two doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to-- Oh, you two meaning me and Chris?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. What's your reaction.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I am trying to take my stick and hit him with the scorpion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Little scorpion on the end of the stick?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Little scorpion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please hit.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: That is a-- What is that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That, I believe, is in fact a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A natural 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that is! That's your old Keyleth die, too. I've never seen it roll one in my life.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: So it stings you on your eyelid. (Pfff!)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, best place.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: You take one piercing damage and have to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So two piercing damage with the crit.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh. Sure, I like it. Yeah; two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Con save? 21.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Okay. You succeed and take half of this amount of damage. Which is...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, the dice damage is doubled because it's a crit too. So it's just straight damage.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: So that will be seven points of poison damage on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Walking towards the noise,

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rush around the corner and you see this whirling whirlwind of clattering pots and cage and goblin and kobold screaming. Anyone doing anything or are you just watching?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Command.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And try to get both of them and say, Stop it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're commanding me too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, both of the...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The second one ran off down the hall a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but it's still within range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So it's wisdom saving throws?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw, if you don't mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And simultaneously, I am casting Enlarge on Nott the Brave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So--

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I rolled a 14 minus two is 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. 17 minus two which is 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They both have to stop it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So immediately, the one holding the spear looks at you, "Huh!" And you find yourself all of a sudden stop struggling and weapon freezes in place. At the same time, the tiny goblin arms around you suddenly Hulk out and you find yourself lifted off the ground, your legs dangling a few inches off the floor of the cavern.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't make mommy (much deeper) mad! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aww, come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who are you? (deeper) What do you want?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'm Spurt!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: Spurt?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm Bex."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Spurt and Bex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: We're supposed to follow you to make sure you don't drop any food!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We already gave you all the food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! (sigh)"

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Also, I'm supposed to stick a bunch of rock grubs in your mouth while you're sleeping!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Stick a bunch of what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't have to tell them this."

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: He's really big!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Sorry!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys, what the fuck are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, I just feel bad, really, at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're so cute and stuff but like, don't attack us; we're really big.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, you killing them or what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no I'm going to kill them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (scared kobold noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispered) I'm not going to kill you, don't worry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Run.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: If you let us go, I'll let you play with our centipault.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's a centipault?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm interested.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't want to play with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I feel like we should hear this out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your centipault?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's an invention.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does it do?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: It throws centipedes real far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's awesome!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Show us a demonstration and we will induct you to the Mighty Nein.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Tell mommy to let me go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Um... well...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mommy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Show us the centipault.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't attack us, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's only one other target in the chamber.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: All right. Yes, exactly. So I will take off my green slime pot, and I will take off my rock grub pot, and I'll lay down my scorpion stick, and my skunk in a cage, and my wasp in a bag.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: And then I will begin assembling my centipault out of other oddities that I have on me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to open my sketchbook and draw all of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Learning the cutting-edge kobold technology.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should set up some sort of target for the young man.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'll use him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What'd he say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to shoot centipedes at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry, we'll heal you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sounded like there's something that shoots centipedes on me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's exactly what he said.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Then you hear this sound: (pthwoing).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have bug allergies? Oh, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (panicked screaming)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you been stung?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leeches!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord just comes running down the hallway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spear goes clattering to the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really neat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It works! It's amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aw man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's ingenious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whoosh)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was fucking terrible.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Want to see my skunk? I hold it up by the tail.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it alive?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, hi. How's it going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he holds up the skunk, the nervous energy around it, the skunk just instinctually-- (snarl)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (spray)

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dexterity saving throw for Jester and Nott.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Great!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dodge those juices.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You manage to just barely escape out of the way as it--

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: No! Bad, Pepé! Bad! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (skunk noises)

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I beat it with my stick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't beat it! Poor Pepé.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other kobold has fled. It saw the running Fjord centipede nightmare and just left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As fun as that was, you know, instead of killing this adorable little guy, maybe we could enlist him as a scout or guide?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know these tunnels at all? Have you explored since the worm came through?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was that? What did you just do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still hitting the skunk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stop! No, hey, hey!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop hitting it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't beat your skunk.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I put it back in its box.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I have a question for you, my little friend. Do you eat enough under your current leadership?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We will keep your belly full. If you travel with us, you will have never eaten so much in your life. But we do need a guide down here, and you could be that guide.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: (shouting) I'm very quiet! Tie off the cage, sling it over my hornets, tie them back to my staff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it gets us to where we need to be, I'd be willing to drop another spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another 45 pounds, whatever we don't need of that 45 pounds, which is an awful lot of food.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think you'll have no trouble finding your way back. How far down this tunnel have you ventured before, Spurt?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I point back the way we came about 60 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit. Brave new world.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. That is less appealing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you're quiet and you can stealth, right? You snuck up on us very well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that a bag of bees you've got over there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh hello, bees!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I've got plus zero, is that high?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Here are my bees.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Hi, bees.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not the bees. Not the bees.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Spurt, how long have you lived down here?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: 11 days!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 11 days?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long do kobolds live?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: 11 days! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god, this is it! The swan song!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And in your 11 days, what is the worst thing you have ever seen down here?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: My brother got eaten by a green slime.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, like the green slime you have right there in the--

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's the one!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you like it down here? Do you want to come with us?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Where else is there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's other places.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. There's light and other terrain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would you like to follow us towards the light at the end of the tunnel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Except we're leading him to a really scary place, y'all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know that. We don't know, Xhorhas might love kobolds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could let him look at the dodecahedron.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We shouldn't pull that shit out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or leave it in the bag. I'm just kidding, forget it. That's a bad idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That could be a really bad idea, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's funny, but it's not wise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. You want to come with us?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, this kid thinks you're his mom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's super duper sad right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Way to bring the whole room down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm dying. I am dying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: D&D, happiness and sadness tied together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) All right, so what's the marching order?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spurt 30 feet ahead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I walk with my staff out so Stingy is actually in the lead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys follow?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Spurt, roll a perception check for me.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Something around here's stinky!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the best. This is the best!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) Okay!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Hey, it's dark down here!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, this is going to be great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) "It's dark down here." Not good, not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The general bits of materials that you've been used to seeing down here-- the heavy gray and brown rocks-- occasionally, you see flecks and glimmers that your passing light puts a shine across. You go over and inspect it and it is a black, glass-like substance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it obsidian?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's obsidian. You continue moving forward and there's more sections of it, and you can see where bits of it are broken and flaked off where the worm was burrowing through and battered through a section of obsidian that then shattered.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If there's any way to scoop up a couple of pieces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, definitely. You gather up a bunch of obsidian shards. A lot of it is broken and brittle, but there are some larger bits that you can find that are pretty jagged, really. You see them first, so you gather what you want.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm too busy eating the poop out of my skunk's cage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goodberries!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey, guys, kobolds have ecology down.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Nothing goes to waste!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a Dune suit, man, you can't let that shit go to waste.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Reduce, reuse, recycle!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stop, I just got better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just saying, none of you has a weapon that feeds you. The air gets steadily warmer and warmer as the hours pass, and the floor itself begins to give way from the softer dirt and dust with loose pebbles to become a harder, more porous rock, and the obsidian begins to become more apparent and more consistent. You, Spurt, begin to see a dull light ahead. A dull, low, red light.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Perception zero.

lines.name: MATT, SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Light! I see the light! I run toward it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see what it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks to be the tunnel coming to an end for some sort of chamber. You're too far away to make out any details, but it looks like there is a room beyond it that has a dull, red glow to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, Spurt, don't run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just run out?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one across the way, leaning against the wall, standing at roughly 18 to 20 feet tall, dark gray skin. What little bit of red hair you see peeking from underneath its armored helmet as it's wearing heavy, dark armor covered in spikes, metallic thorns. One hand is holding a tower shield, roughly its full height, also covered in spikes in the front, with another shield just like that that's leaning on the wall. It looks like it's currently spacing out for a moment, looking back towards the citadel. To the immediate left of you, on this side of that molten river, you see a female fire giant, wielding a giant maul, who is in the process of picking her teeth with some sort of pointed bone, and neither have noticed you, strangely. They rolled really shitty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said citadel. We are seeing a fortress down here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just see the kobold rush out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what do you do, Spurt?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: How far away is the closest one to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The closest one to you is about 20 feet to your left.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I throw my wasp nest in a bag at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for attack on it-- or is it a saving throw on their part?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I throw the bag into a five-foot square within 20 feet of me and it bursts open into a swarm of wasps with 11 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spurt runs out, turns, and, "Ah!" (impact, buzzing). The giant goes (grunts) and slaps--

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: You dead! You dead!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love him!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please have some real armor!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 to hit against you.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: (laughs) Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 28 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I win! (splats)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Spurt turns after throwing this, and then a giant hammer (slamming, squishing) Gallaghers Spurt across the stone floor of this open way.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run to the side of the cavern wall and lean up against it and shrink down.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: A little green slime seeps out underneath the hammer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hammer lifts up and you see the stringy mess that was once Spurt detaching from the hammer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My boy! He was my boy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shh! Shh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone make a stealth check here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb starts walking slowly back through the entire walking formation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering, laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy fuck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He died as he lived, as a spurt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Chris.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we rolling, stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That happened.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That spurt was quick, but potent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Pass Without a Trace was not cast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're stealthing? Natural 20!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) Natural 20!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, fuck y'all, because I rolled a two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a four for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 23, natural 20, 19, and Yasha rolled an 11.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled an 11.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, wow. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I be rolling stealth checks for Nugget?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that Dani?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just heard Dani break in the other room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a delayed reaction out in the lobby!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The delay is the best.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that the quickest we've ever had a player character come in and die?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all pull to the sides, you hear (heavy stomping). A hand reaches down and rubs it through the smear that was once the kobold and rises up. A couple of pieces (plopping) into the stonework, then the light goes dark as the giant's head bends down and one giant eye peeks through the tunnel in your direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it on its way down into the tunnel? How big is this tunnel, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tunnel is ten feet wide. The giant is going to have a hard time. It could probably get in there if it crawled. Right now, it's leaning down and looking inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lights are dimmed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're pressed flush.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys just barely fucking made that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, two natural 20s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any of you guys speak Giant?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, that's right!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because he's a what?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because of his background, his race.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because he's so awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a secret! It's actually one of the languages that you get as a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's secrets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure enough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Carry on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. What you hear is: (speaking Giant). You recognize it as, "Be careful. Looks like we got rodents." You guys hear, on the opposite side, the one that was laying with the shield sits up for a second and takes the shield, walks over to the river of lava, scoops up some of it and pours it across the top of the shield. It's like a pachinko machine; the lava fills the front of it, on the inside there's a pocket, and where once there was just dark iron shield, now is heating up and the shields have a fiery exterior to them. After it fills both the shields, it holds both of them, gets back to its position, and they're both looking around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does Caduceus see that, or everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's across the way. You have no idea what the other giant's doing, but this one is across the way and is visible from your position.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They think there are more kobolds coming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are we going to get out of here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And where are we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we see into the chamber, across on the other side? It's not a chamber; it's huge, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm terrible at this. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to see from this distance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb, you ever read about anything like this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have I ever read-- I've read a lot-- about fire giants under the earth? Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, crazy, dark-- oh, you have?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No dark citadels? I mean, this is an accident, right? This isn't where we're trying to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know about the history of the country I grew up in, not about underground fortresses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, you know what we should do? We should mark this on the map.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's put a pin in that and get back to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we'll get back to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In a map? Should we mark this on the map then, with a pin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was speaking in metaphor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, I like those.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can create a diversion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could create a diversion. Hold on, let me see what kind of spells I have taken.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But then to what end? We're going to run in there and do what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far from the opening of the tunnel that we're at, off to the left, are both of the fire giants?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check for me to take in the details of the scenery.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No shit. Okay, not only, as you lean forward and poke through, really assess the scene-- I'll just pull out the map and show you, because you rolled a natural 20. I'll be right back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got to love those Critical Role dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So attractive, so sexy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perkins! You are such a fun player! Jeez!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You chaotic motherfucker. How much shit can I throw on one person?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Such a 180 from Shale, when you were here the last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here's where you guys are. This is the tunnel. Because you rolled a natural 20, you can see on the other side a continuation. You gather that when the Kryn traveled through, they probably had to make their way through this chamber, and you gather from the surrounding and the vicinity, the obsidian was probably a difficult thing to pass through for this worm, and probably why it was forced to briefly make its way through this courtyard.
