lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is this? Where the fuck are we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we think that the Kryn went through and were allowed to pass?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet that these people are posted here

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an interesting observation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think diplomacy will be our best tactic. Let's use words.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's offer them some food.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the other fire giant--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that the splatter of dead Spurt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's where Spurt met his end.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here lies Spurt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The second fire giant is on this side of the molten river of death?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh, one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then that's the other one on the opposite side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a fire giant? I thought that was the citadel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the citadel's way that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those are shields?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, you can't see the actual figure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. That's a dude, double fisting, full on--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a big problem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pugil sticks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's Laser and Target! And you're going to fight: fucked!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fire shield! Magma shield!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So potentially-- Okay, I have an idea. What if, Caleb, you make your bubble then one of us just yells out to the fire giants, "Hey. We just want to pass through; we don't want to have "anything to do with you. We're just chasing down these dicks that passed through your land, "that's it." Then we hide in your bubble so that they can't attack us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then they know we are here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah, but what are we going to do? We can't all be invisible and they're right here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What happens after they attack us in the bubble?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much can the bubble take?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They can't get us through the bubble.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe we can come back a little later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't think they're going to have other sentries posted when they leave their post?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I don't know about the bubble thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can throw my voice if we have to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if it breaks, what about when it expires?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just an extra bonus of being in the tunnel and extra protection or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could have it there in case we need to retreat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, if we are crazy enough to start a fight with these two--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which I don't want to do. I just want to talk to them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But if we do, the bubble is a good idea, although I have to stay in the bubble for the bubble to be in effect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Non-fighting options: I can take one person with me, 90 feet, in a single direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can also make my voice, I believe, come from wherever I like within 30 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, use a distraction, get them looking at something else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just to have a conversation with these guys, see if they're willing to make a deal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester can get across the entire span.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I could do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could create a diversion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am a great sprinter, like, real good, 100 meter dash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, just saying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can get across.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could create a false diversion that's a massive beast in the opposite direction of us or I could make a real beast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, can you make it look like it comes from the cave and then runs off so that it doesn't appear out of nowhere?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which cave? Our cave?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or just emerge from the lava.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or just come out of the lava.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh. Lava monster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You Banished that stone creature? I know how to do that as well. If you and I both take a shot at the one on our side, one of us maybe will succeed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I hit it with Bane beforehand it would also have a slightly harder time doing that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oof. But it could also succeed against us and then we'll have to fight a giant. I think it would be better if, you know, I could Dimension Door with you, Caleb, over to the other side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We never engage with these fucks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what about us? What about the rest of us? You're just going to leave us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he's going to make a big distraction and then we all run.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a sneaking suspicion that there's probably-- These giants are fast, faster than we are. Probably with some range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would I know anything about giants, reading up on them or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a history check for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cobalt. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They generally live beneath mountain ranges and areas of heavy volcanic activity. They are considered the artisan crafters and forgers of giant kin and the Ordning. They have-- They're evil.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, they both are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's just giants.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So probably not amicable or prone to negotiation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They enjoy free labor, so they like to take slaves to force to do the menial tasks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And they craft things so they're not stupid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. They're intelligent like an average being would be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Averagely smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't heard of tales of the great crafty intelligence, but nevertheless, they still built this entire underground city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It just happens, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up. Wait, which library was this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the Cobalt Soul.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Focus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a suggestion. I can make a manticore appear, run from the cave and leap/fly over the river and carry off in the direction that is opposite of where we need to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Then we all run.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this a real manticore or is it an image of one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It sounds and looks like a real manticore, but if you make contact with it, it's just an illusion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While they are all debating this, I channel a little bit of transmutive energy into my stone and change its focus from constitution to fire resistance for myself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you can go invisible, you can go the entire distance, you're fast as balls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go the distance!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb's fast as balls.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can briefly go invisible, but not for this whole run.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not today, I didn't study that last night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can take one person with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you get that far, too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With one person.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mister Caleb is the one to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about Yasha?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody take Caleb. I'll take Yasha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't take Yasha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's bigger than you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both medium sized.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. She's not large.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's the odd man out? Who doesn't have a way to get over there real quick?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can run and I'm invisible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How fast can you run? You're pretty fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are the quickest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can be invisible for one run-- for one action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long is your speed?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can get 60 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could Blessing Of The Trickster you here and that way you're a little more stealthy as you're going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I mean, I'll be invisible until I'm visible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, how do you feel about---

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could Polymorph someone!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Into what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Into something that, you know—

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dragonfly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! That can get across! I could Polymorph. I could Polymorph you and I could Dimension Door me and Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear this heavy smacking sound as the fire giant on your side of this courtyard is putting to bed the rest of the bees that have been harrying its kneecap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb, do you have a plan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A plan?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To get across?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm the odd man out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm asking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, there are many things I could do, but I did not do my homework last night that would facilitate those things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to bamf with him? Weren't you going to Dimension Door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One of us needs to take Yasha, one of us needs to take Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm taking Caleb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll take Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're running balls, you're invisible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far can you go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 90 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is not across the way. That is just to the other side of the bridge, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you could go farther than that, Fjord, that's not as far.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It would be pretty close. We're going to send both of them in the opposite direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we dashing partners, me and you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ready?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. How about

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, sounds good, I like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should I be invisible at the beginning or at the end?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to be Polymorphed?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can be invisible for 60 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well I won't be able to Polymorph you once you're out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll Polymorph, then, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you keep your intelligence when you're polymorphed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here's the order. You're going to Polymorph Caduceus. You're going to go invisible and get started. I'm going to set the diversion and then we start going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then we're going to go. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need me to do anything to make the diversion look even more realistic?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I could--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester, bring the haversack over, open it up so that Beauregard can focus on the mote of possibility.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that bad? Is that going to send stuff to-- okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't take it out just let it in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just like huffing gasoline.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (deep inhale)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're huffing literally right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you take a moment and focus on the dodecahedron.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are doing that?

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: It's in the bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take your fragment of possibility.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beauregard's face goes into another dimension for a moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to Blessing Of The Trickster you. You're still super stealthy, I don't know if it matters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was so wonderful having Nugget around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nugget's just going to run out and he's going to blink and blink and blink as far as he can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to be fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. He's going to be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also going to add resistance to you so you can add a d4 to any saving throw for the next 60 seconds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It gives you advantage on stealth checks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can add a d4 to any saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I turn to Yasha and say: When I give you the signal, you and I are going to run towards the river of magma and hold on tight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are over on this side here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is going to go so good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a great plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mighty Nein, we have to do this for the memory of Spurt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For Spurt!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was so cute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The kobold who was just introduced to us and killed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, what should I make you? What do you want to be?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. Man, there are so many options. What would be fun? I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe a dragonfly could be really cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, dragonflies are pretty cool.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Well, if you're a dragonfly, will you remember what you're supposed to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I don't know, but to be fair, I'm not sure if I remember what I'm supposed to do anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keep talking amongst yourselves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you cast Polymorph-- If I were to cast it on myself, I would remember what I was doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look, there's the creative lead of Dungeons & Dragons over there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who would be like: "Um, actually--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You take all the stat adjustments except for your brains in there, so all your decision making is the same. But dexterity saves and stuff, that's the creature's stats, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But Nugget's like, in your pocket, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Sprinkle's in my pocket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doesn't everyone have the creative lead of D&D next to them when they play a game?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get the limited edition from the local store, you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I actually have a question, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When I Dimension Door, I can take another creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean I can't have Sprinkle on me or else I won't be able to take Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to take Sprinkle off, out of my hood. Okay, Beau? Take care of Sprinkle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's on you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's okay, Sprinkle. Just hold onto him when you run, okay? Don't let him get left behind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't he do-- He's more magical than I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Sprinkle, he's my weasel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just imagine if Jester had teleported away and went with Sprinkle and Caleb is just going: Uh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nugget's going to blink, blink, blink.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hide, probably in your pocket. I'm going to hide on you as the dragonfly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three, two, one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Polymorph.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Invisible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what order are we doing this, guys?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Polymorph.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Invisible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're Polymorphing Caduceus into what?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: A dragonfly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get your head start, both of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say for the purposes of that, we'll say this is you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're hitching a ride on me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hitch a ride on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau is now in the position to hold—

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not just going to fly across the room by yourself?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's faster.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beauregard is now Noah's ark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are the Mighty Menagerie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau and Nott, I'm going to give you 15 seconds before we start.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we should start with the monster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's your call.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because if I go out there and trip, the jig is up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you going to trip?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, it's expecting something to come out the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, fine. I will use Major Image and I will cast the image of a manticore climbing out of the magma river on this side of the bank, roaring at the fire giant and then leap, flying over to the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's epic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one, looking off to the side, goes and reaches off to one of the boulders off to the side and grabs it. As it picks it up, those at the front can see, the rock seems to heat up. There are veins of heat on the inside as it grips it. So you create the effect. This is Major Image, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Major Image. Visuals and sounds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Visuals and sounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Watching a manticore rise out of magma is insane.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Very heavy metal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he comes out here, roars, and then jumps over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your spell DC?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's a 16. Shit. Where the hell is that on this thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perfect plan. Foiled on the first step.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anyone know where that is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your spell save DC?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's right at the top of your-- If you hit Spells, it'll say at the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One? 20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it? Is it a natural 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I literally rolled two 19s in a row.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the manticore takes off, the one holding the rock is like-- It twists the rock in the other hand and reaches over to the side and grabs a chain and starts ringing this loud bell. It's echoing through the chamber. They're both confused as this thing flies off and they look at each other like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they looking at each other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's up next?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run? Plan still goes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't believe I rolled-- It was such a great idea, I just rolled really high!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have any other thingies?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't do anything else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's all I got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's doing what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're clanging?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we run out of here are we-- How far is his melee, ten feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would say 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Massive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's probably ten or 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would imagine it has larger reach than an average creature, being a giant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, should we just wait until it dies down then go?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, I'll do it. Caleb leans out the passageway and casts Polymorph on the giant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the save on that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is 16, I believe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 wisdom?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 16 wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. For that one, five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a cow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right. I don't have a cow mini on me at the moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My god, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How dare you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. How fucking dare I? I'll use this horse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You call yourself a dungeon master? Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the fire giant suddenly (swoosh) (moo).

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (yelling) Go! Run!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We break out. Yasha and I run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone needs to roll initiative on this because you're entered official combat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Don't fuck me, Gil.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god. One. Well, wait, no. There's no natural ones in initiative. That's a three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Eyy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. 25 to 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20 plus four. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damn, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to burn my boots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 20 to 15.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If anyone attacks the cow, I'm going to beat you up in the lobby tonight. Don't do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who would attack the cow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha hates cows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one 15 to ten?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (like Yasha) A cow killed my wife.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did Yasha roll?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So Yasha's at nine?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Caleb. Polymorph happens immediately so you can do it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb at three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you're at the bottom.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. It's concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Beau, you're up first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am hauling ass across the bridge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (counting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, the giant totally sees you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Step of the wind, step of the wind, step of the wind!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a bonus action. (counting)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get to move 45 feet-- is my movement, so add ten more to both of those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, right. It's actually ten more, and you still have your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to fuck with this guy.

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She completely just skids off, no effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Usain Bolt just comes (swoosh).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also un-Polymorphed over there, as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When we get to the other side, I smack Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just squeeze. That's all you've got to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you go, (smacking and falling) and Caduceus suddenly apparates next to you, almost collapsing you from the weight of his much larger body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, get off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it, all right. That finishes your go. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run up, grab Caleb and Dimension Door to the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (swoosh) On the other side of the tunnel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, it's just us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need Yasha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nugget's going to run and starts running out and fucking blinking as well, oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (poofing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. Got me a horse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is happening?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (barking, poofing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nugget comes out. Blink dogs have a movement of 40, so that's (counting).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, he's so cute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's pretty fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your go. Fjord, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord's going to run out and hug to the right, and he's going to head in this direction towards the magma river and go: Yasha, come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and I will hold Thunder Step until Yasha is next to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's next, right? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to poke my head out and cast Blindness on the giant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You get there to cast it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's the DC on that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 16 constitution.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution. 26. They got a lot of constitution, these fire giants.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah. It was a good thought.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all right. No, it was worth the thought. I've got a bonus action, I suppose, still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (knocking) Wake up again, guys. I'm going to cast the swarm right in his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Isn't that once per long rest, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We took a long rest since the last time I used that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With the-- oh, we did!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The beetles scatter and go--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's been a long rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has been, yeah. I was thinking of the kobolds, but no. It was earlier, before that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your movement's 45?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So yeah. That's a swarm of insects and I think they're going to attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll be short 30 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can go 30 feet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. I'll be short 30 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's eight, nine, ten, 11. That's 11 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're attacking the shield, and it's burning up the beetles because it's a flaming shield.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to try to get them on the face, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sizzling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just popping.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and I'm going to pop back in all the way as far as I can, against the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You popped out and-- this is the wall here. This is a tunnel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, okay. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now the fire giants' turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeing Fjord there. (counting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's lava. He can't walk in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He is going straight through the lava? But there's a bridge!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck bridges.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to attempt his shield charge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shield charge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, actually. It's going to instead cruise up 30 up to that point and it's going to grab a rock off the ground and chuck it straight at you, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a rock, or like a rock?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a rock. It's about the size of your torso.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just wanted to check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Picks it up-- drops the shield for a second, picks it up and (swoosh) lobs it right towards you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Princess Bride moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's going to be 32 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (explosion) Fjord just explodes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just powder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The second splat on the fucking ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't tell where Fjord ends and Spurt begins.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck. That definitely hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, fuck. All right, that is 34 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a concentration check.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you are currently holding your spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Polymorph.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not Polymorph. He's holding-- like, when you begin casting your Thunder Step.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Constitution check or saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The DC of 17 you have to beat to maintain concentration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20. That was going to be a plan ruiner for the second time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cow's going to move.

lines.name: SAM, LIAM
lines.text: It's going to moo-ve?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh god. All right, I don't have movement for a cow here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably 15 feet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bison, Buffalo?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Speed 40 feet" is what the internet is telling me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They have four legs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, dude, they can move.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (mooing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on. Cow. There it is: "Large beast, 30 feet"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) What does the cow say?

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cow's going to go ahead and attempt to attack you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just let it happen. Just let it happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (ramming) Bitch slap a cow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 to hit. What's your armor class?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The cow gets you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They got big-ass teeth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make another constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Another constitution saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. It's DC ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god! Damn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take 30 points of cow damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Next time, you specify dairy cow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This has been too much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha will use 40 feet of movement to run past the cow to come into contact with Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the cow get an attack of cow-portunity?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The cow is going to probably turn back into a giant when they move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She just barely makes it around with her 40 feet of movement to get to you, the cow now blocking that space that she was going to run through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does the cow get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she hasn't left the cow's melee range.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha runs up to you and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord summons the falchion and stabs it into the ground casting Thunder Step and will go 90 feet in the direction of the tunnel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many times have we said cow in the past 30 seconds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys appear already in the tunnel across the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That didn't damage the cow at all, did it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does. It does 3d10 thunder damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Low damage to the cow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot about that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll three ones, three ones.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting) 20 points of thunder damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there a save?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the cow super dexy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Constitution 16.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Cow-stitution.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13, fail. Takes 20 damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, it takes 22 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (poof)

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that does carry over seven points of thunder damage to the fire giant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey! All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did we do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott's the only one!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Super invisible, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're invisible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I blessed you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, what does that do again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It gives you advantage on stealth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That just means you're going to Bilbo Baggins your way across this bridge, motherfucker!

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Take your time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I will stealthily--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long can you stay invisible?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One minute. I will stealthily emerge--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you've already cast Invisibility on yourself?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. It's probably been one round now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have to get across that bridge, right? There is no other way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your speed is now 35, because you took the halfling feat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Correct. I will stealthily make my way to the bridge, around the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're invisible, "Impossible to see-- The creature's location can be detected by "any noise it makes, tracks it leaves--" So still means stealth check, but you have advantage on the stealth check. I believe if you're moving your full speed it's disadvantage on stealth? I'm trying to remember.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But with Blessing of the Trickster it might be balanced out, because you get advantage on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 15. Not great. Oh wait, I also get-- I have the hood, the cloak, but it's all canceled out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Passive perceptions are 15 and 16. Both giants look, and they see footsteps and they're both like, (grunts). They still don't know-- they know the general vicinity where you are. Anything against you still has disadvantage, but it's still your turn. You still have your bonus action and your attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Yeah, I'll just kill them both.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can use an action to dash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll action dash, but not up the bridge. Around the side closest to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has disadvantage on the attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So for this here-- this is with its giant maul. That is a 20 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, wow. That's a lot of rolling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that drop your invisibility once you're hit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. I think so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't kill my goblin, Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do whatever you call it to halve that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you use your reaction, so that makes it a 14. Go ahead and make a constitution saving throw, DC ten, to try and maintain concentration on Invisibility.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it doesn't just automatically drop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind of check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the base DC.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You maintain?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, she's still invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, 20, 25. You still have ten more feet of movement there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Under the bridge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And-- (pained screaming) I'm coming for you, Spurt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're under the bridge now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I will press my body to the bridge and bonus action just hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Go ahead and make a stealth check. This is with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just wait, just wait. Don't do anything yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn. Caleb, you're up, if you want to do anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's the save on that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 16 charisma. Components are an item distasteful to the target.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. Natural 19 plus five. I'm rolling really fucking good for these guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is ridiculous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Big fire giants, they are really--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are. That's a plus five--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is vengeance for the traffic cone guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So for my movement, I am going to just take a step, not back in, but to the side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Actually, and I will walk-- To the other side of the dog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Okay. Is that your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. And I'm just looking for Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. That finishes your go, to the top. Beau, anything? Are you staying put?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am going to peek around the corner. And I'm going to hold my action to run and grab Nott, if I see her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To what? To--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To run and grab Nott, if I see her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll hold, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You doing anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure. Yes, I am going to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're back in the tunnels, so you have to move out to really get a good view.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to just pop my head and out and see what's happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to cast... Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're on deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cast Jesus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck. Okay I'm not concentrating anymore. I'm going to Invoke Duplicity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Where are you placing your—

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to send my duplicate 30 feet in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to make her run out and leap over the lava and land on the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just appears to leap and land.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then she's going to act like she's readying for the fight and getting ready to cast something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I will say, make a deception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, La. Come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God fucking dammit. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it worked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn, Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our deceptions are so deceptive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I don't want to draw any more attention to the cave, because that's where he's got to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do not. They haven't found me yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am definitely not 30 feet away from that big mo with the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have to get way out there to be 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have to get a lot closer than you are, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am 60 feet away from Nott, however, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are actually further than 60 feet from Nott.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But getting 60 feet from Nott is not--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not too bad. You can move 15 feet and get pretty close.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then hop back in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could do that, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm going to hop out and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't know where Nott went.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's right. I don't know where Nott is, do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You walk out and go-- And don't see Nott.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then I would have just...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You going to join me on the nope train?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be on the nope train.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, do you move back in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. In fact, if anything--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could prep a healing for when you see Nott.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to hold a healing spell for--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What spell?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just the bonus action one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stepping forward and slamming into the stone there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But my fake manticore is still flying around!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is. And there's a lot of people really confused out by that citadel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screeching)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should go attack the citadel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck our culture.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whole bridge comes crashing down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into the lava there. This bridge part collapses. Nott, I need you to make a dexterity check. Or saving throw, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take half. That puts you at, it would be 14 down to 7 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If she would have rolled a one, would she be in the lava?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So pushes into this area, knocks the bridge over, continues the movement into that point there. This one here is going to go ahead and move forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to make a concentration check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is total-- you rolled an 18, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I believe so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still cannot see you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's your jumping distance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Yasha's turn. Anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Negative. Nope train.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I close my eyes and imagine my beautiful husband waiting for me, needing me, and I run across the lava.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With my ring of water walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You run across. (burning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go around in a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you leap on the crumbled bridge parts?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'll try to leap on some rocks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you. Are you going to try and leap across?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there chunks in the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, there is one chunk here that is splashing and hasn't sunken in yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make an athletics check, we'll say, just to try and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (swish) Making it across this way. As you rush across, though, the movement catches its attention. It gets an attack of opportunity on you. However, it's at disadvantage on the attack. So that would be 17 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My armor class, as of today, is 18.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because of the level up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's (counting). You can attempt one more jump.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Athletics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Less. It's nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'm trying to remember where that is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You get to keep moving though, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is what happened the last time we went to the Underdark.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Man, you had to regrow a leg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, it's going to happen again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, pardon me here--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that citadel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's just where these people live, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not in that book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Other beautiful book.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But they are really gorgeous to look at.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chris Perkins, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, hats off. Great books.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Book designer. Lead book designer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lava fire damage is what you're looking up right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Google.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I remember this being ludicrously horrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty bad. It's pretty bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It took several days of Pike giving me good mojo to heal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that was before we did the full lava damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On page 249 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shite.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did Chris just say that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bless you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Monster! I got a plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got a better plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got a plan. Everything's going to be fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got a plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have the ability to roll back time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) If I could turn back time.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) If I could find a way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shocked screaming)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't you take my goblin mom away!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, is that 9d10?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (chanting) Ones! Ones!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If he rolls a one on all of them, I'll be okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you full health?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's going to be around 45.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because you got baseball-batted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's counting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your full HP?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not at full HP.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh shit. It's got to be low then to survive that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 48 points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I use my whatever it's called-- Uncanny Dodge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not an attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't work. It's an effect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't really dodge the fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's the thing though: I am holding a healing spell for the second I see him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A Cure Wounds which has to be up next to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, Healing Word. I'm so sorry--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You said Cure Wounds earlier--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I said the wrong thing because I was not running out there. I was going for the 60 foot range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He did say, "I'm within 60 feet of Nott."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow it, all right. I need you to make a constitution saving throw please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I'm dead, so--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're unconscious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're unconscious? Oh, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So the second I see--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second Nott falls, you see a burst of fire and Nott's unconscious body is currently in flames.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: Becomes visible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The second Nott is visible, I cast Cure Wounds. I cast Healing Word. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't have to roll it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, because you are a grave cleric.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are 17 points up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're also on fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18d10? What is the matter with you, Perkins? Didn't you know this moment was coming when you made those rules?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Blame Perkins for everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I get that lava is dangerous, but fuck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what I did last time did not work so I am going to change tactics and I am going to cast instead Polymorph on the same giant--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, on the big one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you polymorphing them into?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A giant octopus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So that is a what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 16 wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 wisdom. That is a 15. The large giant suddenly turns into a large octopus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He has a movement of ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say for the purposes of not having a giant octopus thing, we will just use that for now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's actually pretty close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's your action, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to move back into the-- nope. I'm going to stay right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was holding my action to go run and grab Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't grabbed yet. That was your holding your dash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to grab flaming Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you reached down and the flames are burning your hand. The heat is causing the skin on your face and arms to begin to bubble from just the sheer intensity of it. As you reach down and pull Nott's flaming body up from the lava, Nott, your eyes come open at that moment and you realize you're on fire, but Beau is holding you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Through the flames. (screams)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to go ahead and--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dash back. Step of the wind!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you still have a movement and your bonus so it was just your action to pick up-- it's half-speed to drag somebody with you so you move 20 feet (counting) and then you can move (counting) 15 to get Nott into the tunnel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I stop, drop, and roll with Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That would be your next turn because that was all your actions left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was amazing. What are you talking about? We're fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, your turn. You see Beau suddenly rush in and drop to the ground and Nott is on fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we both on fire or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott currently is the only one on fire but you do take five points of fire damage just from the proximity of reaching out and grabbing Nott's body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb's standing like a doofus because he didn't want to leave Nott so he's still out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill that fire giant with your duplicity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I'm going to run up with my duplicate and cast Inflict Wounds at 3rd-level.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kick him in the shin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kick him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just make him mad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll for an attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on! Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not a bad idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are their god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To keep it occupied: the octopus is going nowhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 plus eight. 25!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 5d10! Oh! 30?! (counting) 36 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 36 points of necrotic damage. As your duplicate rushes forward and reaches out and grabs the knee right in front of the storming fire giant. You watch as the surge of divine energy goes from a blue to a green to a black and as it pierces the knee cap and shoots up the leg, the giant just howls in extreme pain and while it was currently focused and reaching down for another boulder while watching Beau carry Nott away, it suddenly drops the rock, grabs its hammer, and looks down at your duplicate, furious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, meniscus tear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes your turn, Jester? Is that your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's-- yeah. I mean, that's all I could do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Fjord. Anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or-- no, that was my action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, Fjord is doing nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's bounce.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord's doing nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing? All right. Caduceus?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys can put the fire out on Nott at least.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought you put it out? Oh yeah, I will run over and pat the fire out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just watching. "You got this."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You good?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looks fine to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding Stone Shape.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one is going to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten feet of movement!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, just up there and then dashes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now at the end of Polymorph, it doesn't get a saving throw, right? I don't believe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think so. It's just that unless it gets hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lasts for the duration or until the target drops to zero hit points--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 20. The thing sinks into the lava and its feet (sizzling sounds) into it. Doesn't matter. It is now starting to step out of the lava. Has one leg up and its hammer ready, and it's just steaming towards like you like an angry freight train. That ends their turn. Moving forward, Yasha's up. Anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha will put her hand on Fjord and hit healing hands, giving him seven hit points and yell to Caleb: Caleb!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Nott's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screams) Am I on fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Fjord has put the fire out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I will stick my head out through the door and shoot a crossbow bolt at that giant that is stalking my friend Caleb. Not great. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 misses or it hits but it hits the plate armor in its chest and just ricochets off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not great. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Actually, it hits the armor and gets stuck but it didn't pierce enough to actually hurt the giant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes your go. Caleb, your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For an action, I will disengage and juke left-right and run into the hole.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just rock again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The entire door wall closes off with five feet of stone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We must keep running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as that happens, you're like, "Awesome. All right, let's go!" and you hear (pounding) from the back. The stone is already (cracking).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Must go faster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Chris! Join us at the table.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dude! Come here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my goodness gracious.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who sent that?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: That was Dusty Patron of Hugs, @geonerd.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much Chris for jumping in.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was such a surprise.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18d8. Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just to remind everyone: we are taking a week off from Critical Role next Thursday and Talks will be off on that Tuesday the 12th so we'll be back the 14th at 7pm here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Art prints. I'm still talking like Jester and we still have our awesome shirt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But Talks is going to be on this Tuesday?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah, we'll see you soon enough. Until then, we love you guys, have a wonderful week, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: [no audio] [music]
